ygData.subject: Unfinished Blade Mold
ygData.msgSnippet: I just recently turned in one of the task master earrings to the Dwarven smith in CB.  He rewarded me with an unfinished blade mold.  I am curious if this is a
ygData.messageBody:
I just recently turned in one of the task master earrings to the Dwarven smith in CB. He rewarded me with an unfinished blade mold. I am curious if this is a working item and if so were can I find information on how to use it? I had hoped that he would tell me what I would need to use this item…but he said nothing. I have a smithing skill of 110 and climbing so I am willing to bet that I can make something with it if it is working but I really hate to waste the time and money trying to make something when I know I will lose the mold if I try to make anything! Please any hints or tips would be very very appreciated!!!

Thank you,

Jay Viglione
Belrin 14th Rank Cleric of Kaladim on the Karana Server
